front.title: More Instant Messaging Interoperability (MIMI) using HTTPS and MLS

abstract.t: The More Instant Messaging Interoperability (MIMI) working group is chartered to use Messaging Layer Security (MLS) [RFC9420] for its encryption/security layers. This document implements the architecture described by [I-D.barnes-mimi-arch], detailing the components required to achieve MLS-secured messaging interoperability.
